mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') cycle, SUM(a.incomeAccount) totalIncome FROM ( SELECT a.customerId, a.apiTypeId, a.subTypeId, IFNULL( sum(a.consumeCount * b.price), 0 ) incomeAccount, a.cycle FROM qyfinance.CustomerConsumeHourCount a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id customerId, b.apiTypeId, b.subTypeId, b.price FROM qydata.Customer a INNER JOIN qydata.CompanyApi b ON a.companyId = b.companyId WHERE a.typeId = 1 GROUP BY a.Id, b.apiTypeId, b.subTypeId ) b ON a.customerId = b.customerId AND a.apiTypeId = b.apiTypeId AND a.subTypeId = b.subTypeId GROUP BY a.customerId, a.apiTypeId, a.subTypeId, DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') ) a GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') cycle, SUM(a.costAccount) totalCost FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(a.consumeAccount * b.cost, 0) costAccount, a.cycle FROM qyfinance.ApiConsumeHourCount a LEFT JOIN qydata.Api b ON a.apiId = b.id
)a GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.cycle, '%Y-%c-%d') DESC LIMIT 15
